mapper.select: SELECT gno, gname, price, thumbnail, developer, simContent FROM (SELECT gno, gname, price, thumbnail, developer, simContent FROM gu_game ORDER BY salerate DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < 10
SELECT gno, gname, price, thumbnail, developer FROM (SELECT gno, gname, price, thumbnail, developer FROM gu_game ORDER BY reldate DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < 4
SELECT gno, gname, price, thumbnail, developer FROM (SELECT gno, gname, price, thumbnail, developer FROM gu_game WHERE sysdate BETWEEN stardate and enddate ORDER BY salerate DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < 12
SELECT gno, gname, thumbnail, developer FROM (SELECT gno, gname, price, thumbnail, developer FROM gu_game WHERE price = 0 ORDER BY salerate DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < 4
